About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

Bernard is a Freelance Web Developer who helps people and startups build websites. Before starting a Web Development business, Bernards spent eight years as a Sales Manager and SEO for tech companies in Indonesia. After a successful career helping small companies, Bernard now helps them build their websites. Bernard enjoys trying new sports (Tennis, anyone?), cooking and making cool projects related to programming languages.

Account Manager

Had an Amazing time here! Although it is a young company but I'm sure they will go a long way. My job here is pretty much everything, from making the website (which I did do a pretty good job of it, better than the last one) to sell server maintenance license, server hardware, financial work like open up Purchase Order, Invoice, Etc. Even deliver the goods !! Basically I am the Sales Manager / Assistant Director / Tech guy And I enjoy it a lot!

Account Manager

Next is PT. Asaba Computer Centre, quite a well known IT company in Indonesia. After I learned my sales skills at two of my previous companies I decided to try and learn a thing or two about selling at an Enterprise level. Here, I pretty much sell at about everything related to Computers, from hardware to software. Can't say I had a good time here, the office environment is okay but not to my liking. Overall, Learned a lot on a corporate level.

Sales Engineer
